info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 8:17AM EDT until April 7 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Mississinewa River near Marion affecting Grant, Wabash and Miami Counties.
Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County.
For the Mississinewa River...including Marion...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Salamonie River...including Portland...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Mississinewa River near Marion.
* WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 12.8 feet, Flood waters cut off the Stone Crest Manor trailer park and the Quail Hollow neighborhood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 12.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT

area.areaDesc: Grant, IN; Miami, IN; Wabash, IN
